name: Student Visa
description: Study Abroad.Studying abroad with a partner university; Erasmus+ study abroad; Study Abroad without an agreement; Practical information and personal preparation; Evaluation of study.Saturday, October 15 | 9:00 am to 4:00 pm | Online via Zoom. Each year the AAU Teaching Showcase brings together faculty, academic librarians, graduate students, educational developers, and other professional staff.

name: Residence Visa
description: A residence permit (less commonly residency permit) is a document or card required in some regions, allowing a foreign national to reside in a country for a fixed or indefinite length of time. These may be permits for temporary residency, or permanent residency. The exact rules vary between regions.

name: Business Visa
description: A business visa is a type of travel authorization that allows an individual to visit a foreign nation for the purpose of conducting business. During the visit, they may engage in business activities that do not constitute work or employment.

name: Tourist Visa
description: Visitor visas are non immigrant visas for persons who want to enter the United States temporarily for business (visa category B-1), for tourism (visa category B-2), or for a combination of both purposes (B-1/B-2).

name: Digital Visa
description: A digital nomad visa is a document or program that gives someone the legal right to work remotely while residing away from their country of permanent residence..

name: Conference Visa
description: A conference visa can be issued to a foreigner if he/she wants to attend any International/National conferences, seminars, or Academic events in any country other than his/her own. The sole purpose of this visa is to attain any conference/seminar or workshop/meetings being organized other than in your country.
